info.description: With a high back, generous wings and gracefully scrolled arms, the Classic Wing armchair is distinguished by its inviting yet sturdy look. Decorative details include traditional back-tacked seams, piping around the box panel and dark-stained and tapered solid timber legs. Choose Herringbone fabric for a modern town and country look or Rustic semi-aniline leather to evoke an Establishment sentiment.
info.LongDescription:
OVERVIEW
No one can resist the charms of this stately chair. Emphasising elegant proportions with a high back, generous wings and gracefully scrolled arms, the Classic Wing armchair is distinguished by its inviting yet sturdy look. Decorative details include traditional back-tacked seams, piping around the box panel and dark-stained and tapered solid timber legs.
Choose Herringbone fabric for a modern town and country look or Rustic semi-aniline leather to evoke an Establishment sentiment.
 
“Boasting classical styling, this chair has a handsome wing back and elegant proportions,”  Freedom sofa buyer.
info.name: Classic Wing Armchair
